channel.title: Kuis on どうも
channel.description: Recent content in Kuis on どうも

item.title: Quesadillas
item.description: The basic procedure for creating a quesadilla is as follows: Have a large tortilla, shredded cheese of a reasonably meltable variety, add-ins, and sauces ready. Place tortilla on a hot cooking surface. A large, nonstick flat bottom pan or wok works well. Whatever you use, you should be able to cover the food to trap steam for best results. Heat should be medium or medium-low. If browning of tortilla fails to happen fast enough, adjust upward.

item.title: Spices
item.description: Spice mixes of my own I have tested and the results of those tests: Spicy-Sharp Alchemy Powder Cajun Spice Mix, 3部 七味唐辛子, 6部 고춧가루, 1部 Garlic Powder, 1部 出汁パウダー, 1部 A sharp, spicy mix that is, because of its high ratio of 七味唐辛子, quite adjacent to that, but spicier and more rounded. Excellent as a blackening spice for chicken.
